评论概述: 2nd time buyer - couldn't ask for better (this time I'll keep it away from teething puppies, though)
评论详情: I’m re-purchasing this backpack not because it wore out from daily use, but because my teething pup gave it a little too much love! After nearly two years of consistent, everyday use, the backpack was still in great shape and felt practically new - other than the tooth marks on the main zipper and top handles last February (9 months ago).  Remarkably, the zipper held up until just last week, and the top handles never tore, even after months of residual puppy damage. That durability speaks volumes. This backpack outlasted most of my sneakers!  I recently used the "hidden" zipper pocket for my passport during a trip to Mexico, which was incredibly convenient, and I felt really safe because I knew my documents were safe and close by. Unfortunately, the combined wear and tear of daily use and puppy adventures finally caught up with it. (My dog is lucky she’s cute.)  I’m reordering this bag because:  1 - It’s proven to be incredibly durable. It'd probably last 10 years if I'd kept it safe from puppy teeth. 2 - It’s stylish. I’m not trendy by any means, but I get compliments on it all the time. (Maybe I should reconsider other parts of my wardrobe, though!) 3 - It has so many pockets, and let’s be honest, complaining about too many pockets is a pretty good problem to have.  All in all, this backpack has been a total win.

This backpack is a decent size overall and has good pickets to fit my ipad and laptop. Though, I dont see how it is anti theft (?). I use this for college and it does the job. Not too heavy either. Though I was in the rain and it got pretty soaked, it dried well but am not convinced that it is either water resistant or waterproof. The good thing is it did not go through onto my laptop or ipad so it seems decently durable. The price is okay its not expensive though its a pretty average backpack overall and nothing special.
My daughter picked this out and loved it when it came however another girl also has the same backpack so she will no longer use it. Whatever.
One of the main zippers is now broken and does not work at all. For this price I have had other bags whose zippers have lasted for ever. Wasteful purchase

The straps are nice and cushioned so they don’t hurt your shoulders. I resisted buying a backpack for my laptop because I thought a purse type bag looked nicer. I don’t know if the bag looked nicer, but after a couple of times of carrying the bag through the airport and having the thin straps dig into my shoulders I’m all for the comfort of this backpack. I carry a 32-ounce water bottle (shown in picture), and it fits comfortably, along with plenty of room for other essentials. My 13-inch laptop fits perfectly in the dedicated compartment, which is a huge plus. The anti-theft design and waterproof material give me peace of mind while traveling. Overall, this backpack is perfect for work —functional and fashionable!

评论概述: Beautiful and Functional, but Not Long Lasting
评论详情: I bought this bag last December. I work in education, so I would bring it to schools with me. It’s beautiful and I get a lot of compliments on it. It also holds a ton of stuff and has lots of pockets, which is super helpful. I didn’t use it for the summer, but just started again early in September. This morning I realized one of the smaller outer pockets had a broken zipper. I used this pocket a lot since it had some compartments and was great for my keys and cough drops and other smaller things. It’s a bummer that it didn’t even last a full year before a compartment zipper broke, especially for the price.

评论概述: Stylish and Functional: The Perfect Backpack for Every Occasion!
评论详情: I recently purchased the LOVEVOOK Backpack for Women in beige-black-brown, and it has exceeded my expectations! The stylish design is versatile enough for both school and work, while the spacious main compartment fits my 15.6-inch laptop perfectly and includes ample padding for security. I love the various pockets that keep me organized, and the adjustable, well-padded straps make it comfortable to wear for long periods. The durable, waterproof material has been a lifesaver during unexpected rain, and the anti-theft features give me peace of mind in crowded places. Overall, this backpack beautifully blends fashion and functionality, making it an excellent investment for anyone in need of a reliable and chic bag! I teach a class so this is perfect for me.

评论概述: Incredible Amount of Storage and Designer Feel!
评论详情: I purchased this backpack to house my 17in laptop which is also super heavy. I have 2 jobs and 2 laptops to carry around and wanted something which could hold it all! When I tell you it has an unbelievable amount of storage, I absolutely mean it. It hold both laptops, 3 books, charging cables, pens etc. It has a charging port as well. I love the look of the bag and the padded straps help with the weight bearing. Only thing is that I didn't realize when I bought it was the material which seems kind of easy to rip. I had a pen push through the canvas, that was sticking out of the pocket, but otherwise its incredibly durable. I am BLOWN away with this bag. Also- the packaging and instructions made me feel I spent $1000 on it, the care and packaging was very mindful, very demure. BUY THIS!!
